Neeraj Aggarwal
Co-founder at xto10x | GM at Cure.fit | Vice President, Operations at Flipkart
xto10x Technologies Pvt Ltd
Indian Institute of Management, Lucknow
Bengaluru, Karnataka, India Contact info
500+ connections
Message
Follow

About
About
Performance-driven and results-oriented professional with more than 20 years experience in Leadership roles in e-Commerce, Health & Food, and Technology industries.

Built and scaled an online Food Delivery business, managed Supply Chain Operations for an eCommerce leader and setup Operations for an assisted Internet company.

Deep end to end experience in building a low cost, highly flexible supply chain for e-commerce across Warehousing, Transportation and Last Mile logistics.

Expertise in rapidly scaling and managing a large supply chain in a high growth market. Scaled a Supply Chain team to employee strength of 25,000 people, 1.5 mil. sq. feet of warehousing space, geographical reach of 800 cities, and delivering 400,000 shipments every day.

Capabilities include network design, developing breakthrough cost models, automation, new services’ operationalization, 3rd party vendor development and handling high peak events.

Multi-cultural and cross functional exposure in Technology gained in Asia Pacific, Europe and the U.S. with organizations like Capgemini, IBM, Satyam, Oracle & clients like GE, Santander and TSYS.

M.B.A. from IIM, Lucknow and B.E. from Pune University.

Specialties: Operations and Supply Chain, eCommerce, Online Food Delivery, Health & Fitness, Last Mile Innovation, P/L Management, Leadership, Vendor Management, Customer Experience, Leveraging Technology for Transformation
…see more

1w • 
 1 week ago • Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
Super proud of how PeopleCues has been able to transform key employee experience touch points.
PeopleCues
PeopleCues
735 followers
735 followers
6-week review cycles were the norm. Until now.

At Angel One, performance reviews that once took 4–6 weeks now wrap up in just 2–4, and that shift means everything. Huge thanks to Angel One team for the kind words, and for recognizing what we truly care about:
📈 “You’ve moved the needle on the metrics that matter in a performance review.” –
🤖 “The AI-led SBI feedback engine has completely changed the quality of feedback.” –

It’s a reminder that meaningful change at work doesn’t need to be loud, just well-designed.
If a better review experience helps employees feel heard and managers make sharper decisions, we’re doing our job right.

What’s one underrated shift that’s made a big difference in your org? Comment below.

ضمن برنامج طموح لدعم الشركات متسارعة النمو، نفذنا مؤخرًا برنامجين مميزين بالشراكة مع Endeavor Saudi Arabia :

🔹 Scaling Founders by

🔹 Scaling Companies by

واختتمنا البرنامجين بلقاء مشترك مع سعادة محافظ منشآت، حيث شاركت المنشآت المستفيدة تجاربها وإنجازاتها، وناقشنا أبرز التحديات والفرص التي تسهم في استدامة نموها.

هذه اللقاءات تعكس إيماننا بأهمية التمكين المباشر، وخلق بيئة تفاعلية بين رواد الأعمال والجهات الداعمة لتسريع رحلة النمو والتوسع.

كل الشكر لشركائنا، وللمنشآت الملهمة التي كانت جزءًا من هذه التجربة.

كل الشكر لقيادات انديفورو

Hyderabad

Started by the founders of MedPlus, MaxRange Retail Pvt Ltd. is a start-up retail organization backed by a major Bahrain based PE fund. It aimed to capture the Tier 3 & Tier 4 market segment by using the centralized inventory & assisted internet model to provide a unique, kiosk-based shopping experience offering an extensive range at extremely competitive prices. Branded ‘my SmartShop’, it had over 80 shops in India.

- Along with the CEO, was responsible for overall strategy formulation, performance management and reporting the key KPIs set for the organization to the Board every month.

Vivekananda Hallekere

Vivekananda Hallekere
CEO & Co-Founder, Bounce 
CEO & Co-Founder, Bounce
October 5, 2020, Vivekananda was Neeraj’s client
October 5, 2020,Vivekanandawas Neeraj’s client
Neeraj is one of the best ops experts I have met. He has been extremely helpful in our journey at Bounce. He is always approachable, understands the details, down to earth, very effective in communicating and also a great leader. We are lucky to have met him and get his time for Bounce. I would highly recommend anyone starting up in an op heavy business to talk to Neeraj. 
Neeraj is one of the best ops experts I have met. He has been extremely helpful in our journey at Bounce. Arnab Chakraborty
Arnab Chakraborty
Specialist in Building E-commerce Supply Chain. Founding Team Member, Karvy Next- Qykxpress, Ex Flipkart
Specialist in Building E-commerce Supply Chain. Founding Team Member, Karvy Next- Qykxpress, Ex Flipkart
September 29, 2020, Arnab reported directly to Neeraj
September 29, 2020,Arnabreported directly toNeeraj
You get the opportunity to work in Flipkart kind of organization, very rarely, the icing on the cake was to have Neeraj as the Boss. With his ability to go deep into the subject, amazing analytical skill, trust in the team, and above all humility, made him our friend, philosopher, and guide more than a Boss. I fondly recall those days of working together on new implementations like BYOD (Mobile for Delivery Executives), Hub Layout, Van Delivery, Early Morning Deliveries, and many others, which were new experiments at that time in eCommerce, but became standard practice for the industry. Proud to have him as a friend and mentor to this day. All the very best for your role at Xto10X. I am sure this will be another feather in your cap.
